hero.subline: Competitive Programming & SWE coaching with a focus on Algorithms, Data Structures, and robust back-end practices.

coach.name: Marwan Ahmed Abdel-monem
coach.university: Faculty of Computers & Artificial Intelligence, Cairo University — Information Systems (2021–2025)
snapshot: Back-End engineer focused on ASP.NET Core, Django, and Spring Boot with SOLID & design patterns.
Competitive Programming: ICPC Regional Rounds; ECPC finals best rank 63/235.
projects: E-Commerce Backend (ASP.NET Core, SQL Server) — JWT auth, RBAC; optimized queries and indexes
Library Management (C#, MySQL) — CRUD + normalized schema, ERD design
Instapay-style payment simulation (Java) — SOLID; Factory/Strategy patterns
Student Affairs Portal (Django + Ajax) — dynamic filtering; admin efficiency gains
Orders & Notifications Module (Spring Boot) — 12 REST endpoints; performance improvements
Registration Page (Laravel + SMTP + Ajax) — i18n, email verification, API integration

items.q: How to request this coach for corporate training?
items.a: Please go through Coach Academy’s official portal or your assigned account manager. Personal contacts are intentionally omitted.

items.q: Does the coach handle university, graduates, and school segments?
items.a: Yes. Focus on Universities, Graduates, and School; sessions can be online or onsite (Both).

items.q: What topics can this coach teach?
items.a: Competitive Programming (e.g., Suffix Array), OOP, Databases, .NET/ASP.NET Core, REST APIs, and Testing basics.

footer.blurb: Empowering talent through hands-on, industry-aligned tech coaching.
